com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.system.search
Class SystemSearchHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.BaseHandler
      com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.system.search.SystemSearchHandler

public class SystemSearchHandler
extends BaseHandler

SystemSearchHandler Provides access to the internal XMLRPC search-server for system searches
